config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'skipUpscaling' is loaded from the preferences and used to set the value of the checkbox 'cbSkipUpscaling' in the UI.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the preferences are loaded, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user changes the preferences.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'skipUpscaling' configuration option is that it determines whether the application will skip upscaling images during the image processing task. If the option is enabled (checkbox checked), the application will skip upscaling, which may result in faster processing but lower quality images. If the option is disabled (checkbox unchecked), the application will perform upscaling as part of the image processing task, which may result in higher quality images but slower processing.
